All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Bug, CanisLupus, Club, ConwayLocation, Crater, Crustacean, CurvedSword, Dagger, Dirt, Enemy, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, Floor, Floor, Floor, GiantCrab, GiantCrabPincer, GiantCrayfish, GiantCrayfishPincer, GiantDog, GiantDogHead, Graveyard, GreatKnife, Grossmesser, Ground, GustOfWind, Hammer, HarmlessEnemy, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, Item, Katana, Location, LockedDoor, LoneWolf, MartianItem, MerchantKale, PileOfBones, Player, Player, Player, PuddleOfWater, Runes, Scimitar, SiteOfLostGrace, SkeletalBandit, Skeleton, SpawningGround, Stick, TheFirstStep, Trader, Tree, Uchigatana, Wall, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Printable
Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.
